IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO MAXIMIZE THE EFFICIENCIES AND QUALITY OF CLINICAL DIAGNOSTIC, BLOOD BANKING AND ANATOMIC PATHOLOGY LABORATORY SERVICES THROUGHOUT THE MAINEHEALTH NETWORK.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO MAXIMIZE THE EFFICIENCIES AND QUALITY OF CLINICAL DIAGNOSTIC, BLOOD BANKING AND ANATOMIC PATHOLOGY LABORATORY SERVICES THROUGHOUT THE MAINEHEALTH NETWORK.
IRS990.Description: NORDX IS COMMITTED TO SUPPORTING THEIR PARTNERS IN HEALTHCARE BY PROVIDING SUPERIOR QUALITY AND COST-EFFECTIVE LABORATORY SERVICES WHICH EMPHASIZE CUSTOMER SATISFACTION, VALUE, INNOVATION, TECHNOLOGY, AND EXCEPTIONAL SERVICE. NORDX PROVIDES COMPREHENSIVE, DEPENDABLE LABORATORY SERVICES TO HOSPITALS, NETWORKS, PHYSICIAN OFFICES, POST-ACUTE AND LONG-TERM CARE PROVIDERS, MANAGED CARE ORGANIZATIONS, AND EMPLOYER GROUPS THROUGHOUT THE REGION. SEE ATTACHED COMMUNITY BENEFIT STATEMENT.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Identifier: COMPENSATION CONTINGENT UPON REVENUES OF ORGANIZATION
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 5A
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: THE SALES DIRECTOR RECEIVES A PERCENTAGE OF NEW NET SALES PER MONTH FOR EACH 12 MONTH PERIOD.
PART I, LINE 4: THE NONQUALIFIED PAYMENTS ARE FROM RELATED ORGANIZATIONS WHERE THE INDIVIDUAL IS EMPLOYED.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MAINEHEALTH IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF NORDX.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ELECTION OF MEMBERS AND THEIR RIGHTS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MAINEHEALTH SHALL ELECT THE ELECTED MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND OFFICERS OF NORDX.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: DECISIONS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF MEMBERS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MAINEHEALTH AS THE SOLE MEMBER HAS THE POWER TO APPROVE THE FOLLOWING: OPERATING BUDGET AND THE CAPITAL BUDGET; CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN EXCESS OF 1,000,000; BORROWINGS IN EXCESS OF 1,000,000; THE SALE OF ANY ASSETS OTHER THAN DISPOSITIONS OF LESS THAN 50,000; ADOPTION OF BUSINESS, MARKETING AND STRATEGIC PLAN; ANY MERGER OR CONSOLIDATION OR CREATION OR ACQUISITION OF SUBSIDIARY ORGANIZATION; THE FILING OF A VOLUNTARY PETITION SEEKING RELIEF OF DEBTORS; THE COMMENCEMENT OF LITIGATION OTHER THAN ROUTINE COLLECTION ACTIONS; DEVELOPING, IMPLEMENTING, OR TERMINATING PROGRAMS OR SERVICES; ENTERING INTO AGREEMENTS FOR MANAGEMENT SERVICES; AND THE ANNUAL SELECTION OF THE PRESIDENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: UPON COMPLETION OF THE DRAFT 990, THE RETURN WAS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY BOTH THE TREASURER OF THE BOARD AND THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE. SUBSEQUENT TO THE DETAILED REVIEW, THE 990 WAS MADE AVAILABLE TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES BEFORE BEING SIGNED BY THE CEO.
ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS ARE REQUIRED FROM BOARD MEMBERS AND MANAGEMENT. THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS THE RESPONSES TO THESE DOCUMENTS AND ADDRESSES ANY ISSUES IMMEDIATELY.

THE PROCESS FOLLOWED FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION OF THE CEO IS A FORMAL PROCESS PERFORMED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. MAINEHEALTH USES AN OUTSIDE FIRM, TOWERS WATSON, TO PERFORM AN INDEPENDENT BENCHMARK ANALYSIS FOR THE CEO OF NORDX ALONG WITH OTHER EXECUTIVES IN THE MAINEHEALTH SYSTEM. THE FIRM MEETS WITH THE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE TO REVIEW EACH EXECUTIVE'S BENCHMARK REPORT. THE COMMITTEE THEN DELIBERATES ON MAINEHEALTH'S WRITTEN SALARY AND INCENTIVE PLAN PHILOSOPHY AND DOCUMENTS BEFORE MAKING A FINAL DECISION. ALL DECISIONS AND MEETINGS ARE CAPTURED IN MINUTES AND THERE ARE APPROPRIATE APPROVALS AT ALL LEVELS.
DOCUMENTS THAT ARE REQUIRED TO BE OPEN FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
